desc: Cam Caddie designs and manufactures a high quality line of camera stabilizers and accessories for iPhones, DSLRs and GoPro. We offer professional rigs at great prices and our award-winning Scorpion EX camera stabilizer is backed by a lifetime warranty and is compatible with Microphones, LED Lights + Extension Brackets.

layout.text: MOUNT MULTIPLE PHOTO/VIDEO ACCESSORIES TO ANY CAMERA
